txt.en: Greater Token of the Free Peoples[e]

The Greater Token of the Free Peoples is an item of Power crafted by the Elves of the Second Age. Using this item will affect your enemy with a penalty to Melee, Ranged, and Tactical Defences for a short time as long as your enemy does not move too far from the empowered point.
Greater Tokens of the Free Peoples[ps]
